name: DailyFacts
0:
”Alexa, open daily facts”
”Alexa, start daily facts”
”Alexa, ask daily facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily facts
des: Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about your topic of choice. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
